line.en: 'Mmm.'
It's morning...
What a day I had yesterday.
We were teasing each other outside, and... and\neven before that... I liked how things were\ngoing.
'...Alright!'
I jump straight out of bed.
My whole body is full of energy.
Finally, the summer vacation has begun.
There's so many things that I have to work on.
The memory of embracing Ageha vividly surfaced\nincide my head.
'Alright, let's do this.'
I get started making breakfast.
Because it's summer vacation, everyone won't wake\nup for a little while, but still.
I have to head off to the secret base so I need\nto prepare everything.
I make an assortment of dishes that can be eaten\njust by heating them up.
'Hosah!'
Chop! Chop! Chop! Chop! I cut the cabbage at an\namazing pace, if I don't say so myself.
The other guys in the dorm, Kotori, the Kazato\nsisters, they aren't waking up, are they?
Even though from today we can focus all our\nattention on the glider!
'Quack.'
'Ah, Hat, you've come at the right time.'
I pick Hat up and hold him in my arms.
'Listen to me. Even if you say you don't want to\nI'll still make you to. It won't take long.'
'I've got a girlfriend!'
When I was in all-boys school, I wanted to\ntransfer to a co-ed one and get a girlfriend. And\nmy wish came true.
Himegi Ageha. Such a lovely and lewd girlfriend.
Someone close to me.
We did a lot of things together.
'We love each other! We're lovey-dovey! You envy\nme, right?'
'Qua...Quack!'
...Somehow, Hat seems to be quacking in a way\nthat says he couldn't care less.
Mutual love.
...You're right.
After putting it into words I feel uneasy.
In the end yesterday, all we did was kiss, I\nstill didn't get to hear Ageha's feelings...
'Good morning. You're up early.'
'Yeah I guess. Even though it's holidays I still\nhave a lot to do.'
'For the first time in ages no one's up yet. I\nthought I would just lay around for a while.'
'And what will you achieve by laying around?'
'I will achieve being lazy, that's what.'
'Except when I'm in my room, it's been ages -\nages since I could spend time alone.'
'Well you've been busy doing other things,\nright?'
'From now, we're finally going to do this, aren't\nwe?'
'Exactly.'
'That's why, today, just for the first day of\nsummer vacation. I thought I could spend a day by\nmyself.'
'Ah sorry. I didn't mean to intrude.'
'Nah that's OK. Because of you I get to eat a hot\nbreakfast.'
'After eating, will you go out?'
'Yeah. After I wake up those other two.'
'Hm? Ah a message.'
It's from Ageha.
I have a slight feeling of unease.
'Um... it's from Ageha... she says bring Kotori.\nHead to the secret base immediately.'
'Huh? An order? That's rare. Is that it?'
'Yeah... That's it. Just like her.'
...Sorry Kotori. I lied.
Actually the last part...
'You're mine so you have to come'.'
That was the last part...
Without reading the last part I immediately\ndelete the message.
I can't have anyone reading that!
'Just you and me right, Aoi? We're not going to\ncall the Kazato sisters?'
'It seems that way.'
But we can't just leave them here...
I round up everyone and head towards the secret\nbase.
'I wonder what's up.'
'It's Ageha, so I guess something has happened.\nMaybe she thought of a new idea.'
'Tsk! Without informing the leader. What has she\nbeen up to?'
'Aoi, you don't know?'
'Nah... I haven't heard anything...'
'And why do you think I would know?'
'Well...'
'Right.'
'I agree.'
'Hey!'
'That's why.'
'Uh! Again?!'
This is increasingly coming out at unexpected\ntimes.
'...Were you OK yesterday?'
'Yesterday, by the hands of Ageha, I died, and\nascended into heaven. Something, something,\nAmen.'
'You received various forms of retribution I\nguess.'
'And now the Hotaru you see before you, is\nHotaru, incarnated.'
'That's stupid. I don't get you.'
'Dripping down. Drip, drop. Damp. Sticky.'
'Do you even know what you're talking about?'
'Do I?'
Jeez, in this way she really resembles her\nsister.
'Anyways, so you guys are going out now?'
'Huh?!'
'Whaa?!'
'No, no!'
'...Is what you would like to say but...'
'Ah, I am completely stunned.'
'Calm down.'
'She didn't say 'yes'?'
'Of course she didn't.'
'What, am I not good enough?'
'Exactly. You don't listen to a girl's hopes and\ndreams.'
'You think this is funny don't you.'
'Maybe.'
Squish!
'Ah! The first assault in ages!'
'That's what you get. It's punishment for acting\nstupid!'
'Ah yeah, Hotaru. Why did Ageha call on Amane, do\nyou know?'
Yeah, I want to know that to.
'Hm, nah I don't know either.'
I guess if we don't talk to Ageha we won't know.
'But, the Morning Glory, It didn't come today\neither.'
'If it came now we'd be in trouble.'
If we want to get the glider finished on time, we\nneed get things clear with Ageha.
'Hey, I've been waiting.'
'Oh? You're wearing your uniform.'
'Yeah I'm going to go to school after this.'
'Even though it's the summer vacation. If I hang\naround school in casuals, Tobioka will lose his\nhead, right?'
'And Amane?'
'Ah, she asked me to bring her something.'
'She asked you for something?'
'Yeah.'
'Ah yeah. That's why I asked Kotori to come.'
'Me? Why?'
'Take off your clothes.'
'Sure, fine.'
'...As if!'
'Ah, your humor's matured.'
'Whatever. What are you on about?'
'This, this.'
As if yelling out 'ta-dah!' Ageha triumphantly\nspreads out some kind of blueprints.
'Is this... part of the glider?'
'The cockpit...?'
'Ah, you're a smart one.'
'Ah! Is this?'
I think back to that night we looked up at the\nstars after exams finished.
... Before that Ageha told us about those\nclimbers on Everest. And that she wouldn't fly.\nThat the two who would fly would be me and...
'This is Kotori's cockpit?!'
'Yeah! Exactly!'
Kotori looks at the blueprints in amazement.
'I told you before, right. Basing it off a German\ndesign, Amane drew these up.'
'Um... but aside from the design there's one more\npiece of data we need.'
'We just need to take your measurements!'
'Ah so that's it.'
For bicycle races, we often had our leg and arm\nmeasurements taken when we ordered customized\nrace bikes.
So in other words this cockpit will be made\nexclusively for Kotori, only she will be able to\nuse it.
'So with that in mind, time to take your\nmeasurements... take your clothes off.'
'Wait!'
'Aoi, can you take them off for her.'
'Just wait a sec!'
'You don't want Aoi to do it?'
'Of course not!'
'But you're fine with it, right?'
'As if I am!'
'Oh? Really? I thought you enjoyed taking young\ngirls' clothes off.'
'Don't make me out to be some kind of pervert!'
It's not like I don't like it, but.
Ah, give me my feelings back from yesterday.
'OK, Hotaru.'
'I'm scared of the consequences, so I might\npass.'
With a sliding noise she fades into the\nbackground.
'Asa, Yoru.'
'We're with her.'
'Ah you're all useless.'
'You can't talk!'
'Well if you want something done right...'
'You can't take measurements with her clothes on?\nWhen you measure for a suit that's what you do.'
'Heh, heh... hee, hee...'
'Hey, hold on! Wait a sec! Your eyes. Your\nposture is terrifying!'
'Whah! Here we are, about to do naughty things,\nnervously, voraciously... pardon me but I'm\ncompletely obsessed with nudity.'
'Stop that foolishness, right now!'
'I shall not! Hurry up. Take 'em off! Take 'em\noff!'
'Hey! Stop! Aoi, do something!'
'Yeah, seriously Ageha, stop, don't force her.'
'What? Aoi, you're a creep.'
'Why am I a creep?!'
'To measure the length of her arms I need to put\nthe tape into her armpit. And to measure her\nsitting height I need to get to her butt.'
'Look, you're touching her all over! You really\nare a filthy minded creep!'
'You're the one with a filthy mind!'
'True, but it's OK, it's only dirty with you.'
'That's even worse!'
... Everyone takes on an expression of being fed\nup.
Look, no one's amused by your stupidity Ageha.
'Well I'm done with this lovey dovey crap.'
What? What does that mean?
'Her arms and legs are long, hey?'
'From her knees down, they're quite long. She's\nsmall when she sits, man I'm jealous.'
'Gyaaah!'
'Alright, with that I'm heading to school. If\nanything happens I'm counting on you guys.'
'I think I might pop in there too.'
'Have fun.'
'Have fun?'
'Ok, see you later!'
With the master of craziness gone, the Secret\nBase seems to fall silent.
'Phew... I kind of feel exhausted...'
'I wonder where she gets all that energy...'
'But you kind of don't want to lose to her,\nright?'
'Yeah that's true.'
'Alright, I'm going to get down to business.'
'Me too!'
'Yeah!'
'Me, I'm a little curious as to what exactly\nAgeha is doing. Is it just me?...'
'All I'm interested in is watching Aoi work. He's\nso amazing. Oo!'
'Go home!'
'Oh. He says such harsh things to me...'
'That means he's paying attention to me.'
'I'm so happy. That means I'm almost like Ageha.'
'Don't come close to me. If there were two\nAgeha's I'd be terrified.'
'No there's 1.8 of us. Ageha only counts for 80\npercent of a person.'
'Get away from me!'
'Isn't it nice to have two children?'
'What are you on about?!'
'Of course, I'm talking about in the future.'
'Even if I smacked you, you just won't learn,\nwill you?'
'That's just an expression of your love. It makes\nme strangely happy. It's just your love\nawakening.'
'Are you just as crazy as them?'
The older sister likes to shout at people, while\nthe younger has a hidden side about her!?
The future of the Himegi household is in\njeopardy.
Time passes by in a flash and before we know it\nthe sun is going down.
'Ta-dah!'
Ageha walks in with an air of self satisfaction,\ndragging some strange looking equipment behind\nher in a cart.
Actually the cart is being dragged by the members\nof the Touring Club. What they receive in return\nis a smile from our club leader.
If we were to give those kids a picture of\nKotori, like some sort of cash card from 'Kotori\nBank', we could use them to our heart's content.
Well, putting that aside.
'What is that?'

What Ageha is dragging is a plastic pole
framework, with a seat and monitor inside. It
looks like some sort of video game housing from
an game arcade.
It takes up the space of a small bed.
'Wait... is this... a simulator?'
'Good guess!'
I got it straight away. The driver's seat\nposition is the same as the glider's.
'There's... there's no... foot lever.'
'No there isn't. These controls allow you to fly\nwith only your upper body. I've actually had them\nmade.'
'The most important thing to have in this world\nis skillful friends.'
'To make this, you've been going around all over\nthe place?...'
'Yeah, yeah, don't make that face.'
'Getting everyone's cooperation was the biggest\nhurdle I faced.'
'I mean to have the glider made for you. And then\nhave to say you mucked it up and couldn't fly it.\nThat would be the worst, wouldn't it?'
'... That's true.'
'You're right.'
Kotori very earnestly inspects the inside of the\nimaginary cockpit.
'The computer simulators we always use, we can\nuse them in here.'
'Amane adjusted the computer software. She\ncalibrated it to this cockpit.'
'So what you meant by having fun, was this?'
'You're going to use this too Aoi. Use that\ncomputer over there and practice together.'
'That's right. I haven't actually flown before.\nSo I need Aoi to teach me.'
'That's some serious responsibility. Alright.\nI'll do it!'
'Alright, you guys play nice, OK? I need to head\nout again.'
'Huh?'
And then Ageha runs out without giving me a\nchance to ask any questions.
'Gone with the wind... literally.'
'Dances like the wind, disappears like the wind.'
'I don't know where I should get involved, so I\nthink I won't at all.'
'That's terrible!'
And before I realize it Hotaru has disappeared.
'It can't be, into the shadows?'
'Ageha grabbed her by the neck and whisked her\noff.'
'... It looked like she was choking, her eyes\nwere popping out...'
'You're just imagining things. It's just your\nimagination. I really hope it was just your\nimagination.'
'Well anyways... you want to give it a go?...'
We quit thinking any more about the business of\nthe Himegi sisters and start practicing on the\nsimulator.
'Phew...'
'I'm getting the hang of this.'
'Man flying is going to be amazing.'
Because I've built up experience of actual\nflying, even just using the simulator brings back\nall those old sensations.
But in the end a simulator is still just a\nsimulator and it can't compare to the real thing.\nIt makes me want to fly even more.
'Ah I want to hurry up and fly!'
'Me too!'
'After trying out that simulator. It's finally\nstarting to get to me. I'm seriously going to fly\nwith my own hands.'
'You're not scared?'
'Scared? Why would I be?'
'Just to let you know, but I've experienced the\nfear of falling.'
Kotori lightly taps the area around her knees.
Ah that's right... the injury to your knee, that\nwas from some kind of fall. That's what I heard\nanyway.
'Even still, I want to fly. I want to go into the\nsky.'
'Yeah.'
'For me, even if my knee was completely healed,\neven if it was possible for me to go back to\nracing...'
'I don't think I would. I mean I like racing, but\nI love flying even more.'
'Wow.'
Kotori nods cheerfully.
We exchange looks and confirm each others\nconviction.
'I'm back... Oh.'
'Am I interrupting something?'
'Like what?'
'Nah, it just seems like I'm interrupting a\nmoment.'
'Nah, it's nothing like that.'
'Oh really? You guys looked like a nice couple.\nLooked like you were on the verge of kissing each\nother.'
'K-kissing?!'
'You've got a one track mind. If a guy and a girl\nare together that means they're a couple?'
'Well you can't make a couple without a guy and a\ngirl.'
It almost sounds like she's saying something\ndeep, despite saying something completely\nobvious.
Well anyways, I'm sorry to Kotori, but no matter\nhow pretty she is I have no intention of kissing\nher.
Because I've got myself a girlfriend now.
... Even though today we weren't acting like\nboyfriend and girlfriend at all.
Even if we're boyfriend and girlfriend there's no\nchange!
'Ah yeah, anyway, I'm a bit excited about\nsomething. I wanted to get your opinion on\nsomething.'
'What is it?'
'You know Yuka? Just then she told me she thought\nsouffle was... like a similar thing?'
'Similar to what?'
'Passionate kissing. (TLnote: in jap. "sefure"\ncan mean either souffle or passionate kissing)'
After a moment Kotori goes bright red.
'Do you think there's something to this?'
'Of course there isn't. Not a chance. Thinking\nthat is nonsense!'
'Alright that's one vote for 'no'.'
'I think there's something to it. I mean I\nremember when I learned that 'tart' was actually\na dessert.'
'I don't want to hear that!'
Kotori yells out, turns her wheelchair around and\nheads into the next room.
'Oops, I made her angry, my bad, my bad, hee\nheeô'
'What do you think, Aoi... eh?'
'Something wrong?'
I had actually fallen down to my knees.
I feel like I might collapse at any second.
'What's wrong?!'
'Ah, it's nothing, just...'
I get dizzy and bump into the wall.
I stagger off into my room.
S... Sex friends...
Empty relations based solely on sex.
It's not the same thing as lovers.
Me and Ageha... after all, we're no more than\njust sex friends?
Lusting for each other's bodies.
But even though I have... Ageha hasn't made her\nfeelings clear yet... she's making me think that\nshe avoids the topic...
Ageha doesn't think I'm her boyfriend, I'm just a\nof sex friend for her...
When I think this way I feel it keenly.
That's a shock.
Like a collision.
It's... like falling into an abyss, straight down\nto the bottom.
Without thinking I take out my cell phone.
Pick up Ageha, c'mon.
'Yeah, what's up?'

At this moment I though that it'd be nice if it
was a sationary phone like in old times and her
parents picked up first so that I'd have some
time to prepare myself.
'Well, you know... are you free now?'
'Sorry, I'm kind of busy. I'm having my last\nlove-battle with Hotaru.'
'Aoi! I will love you forever!'
'You fiend. Don't get close to another girl's\nman, you harlot!'
'Ah, aah, no! Don't be so rough... ah, I'm\ngulping it down...'
'Pervert, pervert, pervert! I'll spank your ass!'
'Ah, aah, A-chan, here, here!'
'Just what are you doing there?'
N... No... it's impossible to have a serious\nconversation now.
'Anyways, you called at the perfect time. We can\nhave a serious discussion.'
... It's like no matter how far away she is she\ncan read exactly what I'm thinking.
'It's about the weather data of 27 years ago. I\nhad the Astronomy Club look into it, yeah?'
'And as I expected. The conditions now are\nextremely similar.'
'Amana's calculations resemble them closely.'
'That means... it's seriously going to occur this\nyear?'
'Well it's the weather so we can't say with any\ncertainty... but it looks that way.'
'There's about a 30 percent chance that it will\nhappen.'
'Isn't that low?'
'In a normal year it would be 0 percent. Compared\nto that it's an extremely high chance.'
'Yeah I suppose so.'
'Ah yeah one more thing. 28 years ago...'
'...The year before the Morning Glory occurred.'
'I went to the library and looked at newspaper\narticles from that period and found something.'
She was doing that kind of thing?
'Do you remember that thing that happened last\nyear?'
'As if I could forget.'
That last flight... The thin, wispy corridor in\nthe sky.
'That wasn't the real Morning Glory.'
'But 28 years ago the same thing happened. One\nyear before, that same thin cloud appeared.'
'In the regional newspaper they had a picture of\nit. It was black and white but...'
'There's no mistake about it, it was the same\nthing as last year.'
'So in other words it's looking more and more the\nsame?'
'Well, like I said it's a 30 percent chance.'
'That's enough.'
I clench my fist.
If there's a 30 percent chance that's more than\nenough.It's worth taking the risk.
'That's my man.'
'Um, I called about that but...'
'Hold on a sec! Hey Hotaru! How did you get\nfree?!'
For a while I can hear clattering and commotion\non the other end of the line.
'Puff, puff, sorry I'll have to talk to you\ntomorrow.'
'Hey, wait, hey!'
... But she hangs up the phone...
'... What the heck!'
Without thinking I fling my cell phone onto my\nbed.
If the Morning Glory really is going to happen,\nI'm happy about that, it motivates me more.
But if the one who's supporting us... if Ageha\nsees me as nothing but a toy to play with...
In the end is that the reason she won't respond\nclearly to my confession?
'...Heh heh. Ah well I guess just fooling around\nis cool too.'
'No it's not!'
After putting it into words my feelings erupt.
'What's up with her?! Be straight about it!'
'Quit messing around! That's it! I'm done with\nthis!'
I yell out in exasperation and throw my body down\nonto my bed.
'...well... whatever...'
I try to force out a laugh.
'I'm so over this... With that kind of girl...'
'That sly vixen...'
'... Damn!'
My fury reaches it's absolute peak.
'Aaaahhhh!'
Screaming out I dash out of my room.
'Gaaaah!'
Screaming even more I break into a run.
'This sucks!'
'This isn't cool at all! It sucks! Damn it!'
I like her!
Ageha... Ageha...
Her eyes, her hair, her fingers, her lips, her\nlegs, her whole body, her personality I like\neverything about her.
I want to be with her forever!
But still she... she...!
I fling both my arms towards the moon and howl\nuntil I empty my lungs.
Everyone eats breakfast restlessly.
'It's a bit scary...'
'Yeah I know.'
Everyone walks in together.
'Hey guys.'
'Did you hear, Aoi?'
'No... what?'
'A few people from my class, last night they...\nthey heard a wolf howling.'
'Japan doesn't have wolves anymore.'
'Well something like a wolf.'
'Like a wild dog, that's a bit freaky.'
'Yeah true. If the Morning Glory happens, it'll\nbe early in the morning. So we have to leave\nreally early and prepare...'
'The runway is in an open plain, there's nowhere\nto hide... it's a little scary.'
What they're talking about, could it be... me\nfrom last night...?
After we eat breakfast we head out to the secret\nbase.
Ah, she's not wearing her uniform today.
So I guess she'll be here all day.
Alright! Today is my chance to talk to her\nproperly.
'OK everyone's here. Gather around. I have\nsomething important to discuss.'
It's what she told me last night.
Taking the phenomenon from last year as an omen,\nthe chances that the Morning Glory will occur\nthis year are relatively high.
She carefully explains this showing\nmeteorological data and newspaper articles from\nthe time.
'It's actually going to happen... the Morning\nGlory!...'
'Yep. I can't say with absolute certainty, but if\nit doesn't happen this year, it won't happen for\nanother 30 years.'
'In that case it has to come! It will come!'
'You don't have any reason to believe that\nthough.'
'If there's a 30 percent chance, then I believe\nit's going to happen.'
'I can't forget that beautiful sky from last\nyear... the clouds... that white glider flying up\nthere... I'll never forget it.'
'That's right, next time it's going to be us\nflying up there with our own wings.'
'Let's fly!'
'Jeez... I don't like to gamble, myself.'
'Don't say that. Let's all do our best together.'
'...Yeah.'
'Don't get me wrong... It's not like I'm against\nthe whole thing.'
'If we're able to fly in the machine we built\ntogether, I think that would be amazing but...'
'It's OK, we understand.'
I pat Yoru on the head.
'Hey!'
Yoru turns red and becomes stiff.
Oops, I treated her the same as Hotaru.
'Please stop... I don't like that.'
'I think you should only do th-this kind of\nsexual harassment to the girl you like.'
Yoru's voice is shaky.
'Or are you some kind of womanizer? You do this\nkind of thing to all women?'
'... Ah... No, you're right...'
I manage to stop myself from blatantly looking in\nAgeha's direction.
But I can keenly sense that Ageha is staring at\nme.
'It's unfair to Hotaru, Aoi.'
'Uh... oh, yeah, I guess you could say that...'
I can feel Ageha's stare becoming more intense.
'Anyway.'
'I'm not against the whole thing. I want to see\nthe Morning Glory too.'
'So... you know... ah man, don't make me say\nembarrassing things!'
'Let's all work hard together!' That's what you\nwant to say, right?'
Wow, she's turned bright red.
Yoru is a cute girl.
'Alright, let's get to work!'
'Yeah.'
'Yup. Yup.'
Ageha smiles happily.
Jeez, all she has to do is smile and I suddenly\nbecome all happy inside.
'Ah yeah... sorry everyone, there's one more\nthing. Something important we need to discuss.'
Everyone takes on a puzzled look.
'Soon it'll be the real thing. The glider will be\nfinished any day now.'
'So there's something we need to get clear right\nnow.'
'According to the articles the Morning Glory will\noccur at a height of 2000 meters. Maybe even\nhigher than that.'
'The phenomenon last year occurred at about 1000\nmeters. To be honest 2000 meters is a height we\nhave no experience with.'
'Even if we manage to take off and ascend without\nhitch, climbing to that kind of height will take\ntime.'
'And even if the Morning Glory occurs, it won't\nlast for very long...'
'...The glider is a two seater. In other words\nonly two people can fly.'
'Yeah. That's the case.'

'There will probably only be one chance to pass
through the passage of cloud. I was hoping there
would be two chances but... I think it's best we
assume that won't happen.'
'So... only two people will be able to fly\nthrough it.'
And including Amane there are 6 people here.
'With that in mind I want to hear everyone's\nthoughts.'
'Don't hold back. In fact, you mustn't hold back.\nI won't you all to clearly state you desires and\nthoughts.'
Ageha finishes speaking and looks around at\neveryone.
The other day, in the dorm garden everyone\nexpressed their feelings of unity.
But more than just having those feelings, I guess\nit's important that we clearly make the important\ndecisions.

I understand this more than anyone, having
experienced the situation where, before a bike
race, all the team members have to decide who
will be the one to participate.
...The one who get's the ball rolling is Yoru.
'We knew from the beginning that only two people\ncould fly. Am I wrong?'
'I'm going to leave the flying to these two.'
Next she urges Asa to speak up.
'I, I... I saw people flying last year. I thought\nthat it was so amazing.'
'I wanted to fly in those beautiful wings, I\nwanted to try flying. And then I was allowed into\nthe Soaring Club...'
'I really want to try flying in the cloud\ncorridor. I honestly feel this way... felt this\nway.'
She changes to the past tense.
'But... actually building the glider, trying to\nfly it...'
Asa and Yoru have both been to the glider area\nand tried flying as a guest.
'I think it's impossible for me.'
'It's scary. Really scary. I can fly in the\npassenger seat. When someone else flies. But I'm\ntoo scared to fly myself.'
'I'll eventually be able to do it, with a little\nmore practice, but... right now, as things are...\nit's not possible for me.'
'So... I want you guys to fly it. Take my\nfeelings with you and fly.'
Kotori calls on Asa who buries her face into her\nlap.
Kotori gently pats her on the head as she burrows\nher eye brows. Then she declares...
'I'm... going to fly.'
'I've had the cockpit built for me, I want to\nfly. I want to fly so... no matter what happens I\nam going to do it.'
'To be clear, I want to fly. Through the passage\nof clouds. This is all I want to do.'
'That's just like you Kotori. So cool.'
'Thanks.'
'Amane? You're the one who designed it, you have\na right to fly.'
'No, I'll pass. This is your machine now. Your\ndream.'
'I'm scared of high places and got to fly last\nyear. That's enough for me.'
Ah... Amane has honestly graduated from gliders.
'So with that. Don't worry about me.'
'I understand... thank you.'
'OK. My turn.'
'I'm not going to fly.'
She says basically the same thing she said the\nother day.

She's happy with taking a supporting role.
Someone has to do it and it's important that
someone who has a strong desire like Kotori is
the one to fly.
'Because of that, I'm going to be working here\nand there.'
Huh...
'I feel the same way as everyone else. My desire\nto fly with these wings is stronger than\nanyone's!'
'We got it. Don't worry.'
'Yeah we understand how tough things are for\nyou.'
'Ok, lastly, Aoi.'
Ageha stares at me.
'For me there's nothing else but flying.'
My mouth partly moves on it's own.
'Since last year... I've thought of nothing but\nflying... I've been practicing. That's... all\nI've been doing...'
'So the option of not flying...'
I wonder what I would say if Ageha said she\nwanted to fly.
Would Kotori step down... would I decide to hand\nthe reins to her?...
The dream of the girl I like... I wonder what I\nwould've done...
'For me... that isn't an option.'
I declare without looking at Ageha.
But I can tell that Ageha gives a clear nod.
'Yeah.'
'Well, that's the way it should be.'
'I can't even think that Aoi wouldn't fly.'
'Well it's decided then. Aoi and I will be the\nones to fly. Ageha will be supporting. Asa and\nYoru will assist with everything.'
'But if something was to happen to one of us...\nas much as possible, be prepared.'
'If for some reason I can't fly... Asa, Ageha,\nyou guys take my place.'
'O-OK! I'll do my best!'
'Aoi, you can't get injured. No one can replace\nyou.'
'Hey... that kind of talk...'
'No, seriously. The only one here who is\nqualified to fly is...'
'As we found out last year it's impossible for\nme.'
'That's right. Aoi, you have to get yourself into\ntop physical condition.'
'Think of it as preparation for a bike race, you\ncan do that, right?'
'Yeah... I guess...'
'The ones who should push themselves to the limit\nare Asa and I. The back up crew. The work of our\nirreplaceable member should be to rest.'
But in that case I'll have even less time that I\ncan spend with you... I say this with my eyes.
But Ageha looks away as if she doesn't notice.
'Alright everyone. Let's do our best!'
Our wings.
Our... wings...
'Alright then, I have someone that I have to\nmeet.'
'Good timing. I have to go, too.'
'We'll hit the simulator, right?'
'Ah, OK...'
All I can do is follow Ageha with my eyes as she\nleaves in high spirits.
